an4.108:4.1: * “Cattārome, bhikkhave, balībaddā.
an4.108:4.3: Sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo, paragavacaṇḍo no sagavacaṇḍo, sagavacaṇḍo ca paragavacaṇḍo ca, neva sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo—
an4.108:4.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro balībaddūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.108:4.7: Sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo, paragavacaṇḍo no sagavacaṇḍo, sagavacaṇḍo ca paragavacaṇḍo ca, neva sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo?
an4.108:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisaṃ ubbejetā hoti, no paraparisaṃ.
an4.108:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:5.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo sagavacaṇḍo, no paragavacaṇḍo;
an4.108:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacaṇḍo hoti, no sagavacaṇḍo?
an4.108:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo paraparisaṃ ubbejetā hoti, no sakaparisaṃ.
an4.108:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacaṇḍo hoti, no sagavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:6.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo paragavacaṇḍo, no sagavacaṇḍo;
an4.108:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo ca hoti paragavacaṇḍo ca?
an4.108:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisaṃ ubbejetā hoti paraparisañca.
an4.108:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo ca hoti paragavacaṇḍo ca.
an4.108:7.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo sagavacaṇḍo ca paragavacaṇḍo ca;
an4.108:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo?
an4.108:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva sakaparisaṃ ubbejetā hoti, no paraparisañca.
an4.108:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4.108:8.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo neva sagavacaṇḍo, no paragavacaṇḍo;
an4.108:8.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro balībaddūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
